channel.title: Whonix crashes, freezes, and lags despite my best efforts.
channel.description:
Hello all!
I've been an on-and-off user of Whonix for about a year now, and I've recently installed it on a maximally hardened, high-end Windows PC. On this PC, performance is *very* bad compared to my previous experiences with the software. While it does sometimes work, 19/20 times it crashes during startup or freezes while in use or just lags like crazy.
I've done virtually everything that I could find online. I've downloaded the supported version of Virtualbox and the most recent version of Whonix; I've updated Whonix; I've installed the VirtualBox Expansion Pack; I've increased RAM and CPU allocation to 8GB of RAM and 7 CPUs; I've used a terminal gateway with a graphical workstation by decreasing the RAM allocation for the gateway to 300MB; I've used virtualbox with admin permissions; I've prevented my antivirus from scanning Whonix files; I've tried suspending instead of shutting down... You get the idea.
And at this point I'm at a loss. Whonix is practically unusable in this state and I'm not skilled enough to know how to fix it.
Please do me a kindness and help me out. If you need any specific logs or files please inform me on where to get them on Windows and I will retrieve them for you. Thank you very much!

item.title: Whonix crashes, freezes, and lags despite my best efforts.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
workinandplayin:

fails to star

  • Tor Browser Reliability Recommendations
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Tor_Browser_Crash_Errors
    helps?
workinandplayin:

laggy

Maybe:

Increase Whonix-Workstation RAM.

Whonix – 2 Dec 21

Advice for Systems with Low RAM

How to use Whonix ™ with 4 GB RAM or less RAM.

Kicksecure – 27 Jan 22

Kicksecure ™ Tuning

Making Kicksecure ™ Faster. Tuning Kicksecure ™.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix crashes, freezes, and lags despite my best efforts.
item.dc:creator: workinandplayin
item.description:
Thank you. This has… somewhat helped. I find that Whonix still sometimes fails to start and tor browser is kinda laggy. Is there any additional information?

item.source: Whonix crashes, freezes, and lags despite my best efforts.

item.title: Whonix crashes, freezes, and lags despite my best efforts.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Only this can help:

Kicksecure – 29 Mar 22

Kicksecure ™ in VirtualBox - Troubleshooting - Kicksecure ™ does not Start?

VT-x is disabled in the BIOS. / VERR_VMX_MSR_VMXON_DISABLED / VERR_SSM_FIELD_NOT_CONSECUTIVE / supR3HardenedWinReSpawn / Enable VT-x in BIOS / Aborted Status / Guru Mediation

(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix crashes, freezes, and lags despite my best efforts.

item.title: Whonix crashes, freezes, and lags despite my best efforts.
item.dc:creator: workinandplayin
item.description:
Hello all!

I’ve been an on-and-off user of Whonix for about a year now, and I’ve recently installed it on a maximally hardened, high-end Windows PC. On this PC, performance is very bad compared to my previous experiences with the software. While it does sometimes work, 19/20 times it crashes during startup or freezes while in use or just lags like crazy.
